articles.title: Rohit's India set blockbuster date with Australia in WTC final after NZ beat SL - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Rohit Sharma's Team India punched their tickets for the summit clash of the showpiece event after Sri Lanka failed to secure a win over the Black Caps in the 1st Test of the two-game series on Monday. | Cricket
articles.content: Kane Williamson's match-winning knock against Sri Lanka in the 1st Test has paved the way for Rohit Sharma and Co. to secure India's berth for the final of the ICC World Test Championship on Monday. … [+3013 chars]

articles.title: On Virat Kohli's Criticism Over Century Drought, Mohammad Amir's Sharp Response To Critics - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Star India batter Virat Kohli shut down all the trolls after he smashed his most-awaited 28th Test ton during the fourth Test against Australia on Sunday
articles.content: Star India batter Virat Kohli shut down trolls and critics after he smashed a highly-awaited 28th Test ton during the fourth Test against Australia on Sunday. Kohli's knock guided Team India to a who… [+2545 chars]
